column5: Can any body tell me where I can find a shop or somebody to fix my fishing rod? The top section broke about a foot from the tip.
Call your local tackle shop...they may be able to help you out with a repair.  If they cant do them onsite, then they'll be able to point you in the right direction.
....A foot from the tip, I'd try and get it replaced or buy a new one. A foot off any rod is not repairable and using it a foot shorter than it's origional length is not desirable nor recommended.
Somehow I tend to agree with Spiel for some reason...can't quite put my finger on it.. but i do! lol  That first foot is the sensation trigger for you.. fishin them finicky pickeral fishes.
At 2 feet, it makes a great icefishing rod, have made two already.
Thanks for all the input. The rod was custom made for me so it's hard to get a new section. I will try the company on hwy 7. If they can't fix it, I guess I will have to buy a new rod.
